page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: {SHEPTON MALLET}IS SITUATED ON THE MENDIP HILLS,IN SOMERSET WITH THE RIVER SHEPPY RUNNING THROUGH IT. IT IS NEARLY 1000 YEARS OLD. SHEPTON MALLET IS A SMALL TOWN,ABOUT 3\ MILES SQUARE.IT IS A PEACEFUL TOWN.THE TWO MAIN FACTORIES IN SHEPTON MALLET ARE {SHOWERINGS} ,THE MAKERS OF BABYCHAMN AND {CLARKS}SHOES. THERE IS ALSO A SMALL SHOPPING CENTRE. THERE ARE ABOUT 6600 PEOPLE LIVING IN SHEPTON MALLET.IN SHEPTON MALLET THERE IS A PARK CALLED COLLETT PARK.IT IS ONE OF THE LARGEST AND ATTRACTIVE PARKS IN SOMERSET WITH A LAKE AND LOTS OF TREES,INCLUDING A LITTLE PLAYGROUND. THERE ARE 3 HOSPITALS IN SHEPTON MALLET,ONE BEING FOR THE MENTALLY HANDICAPPED-NORAH FRY HOSPITAL.
